title: Exclusions
fullText:
This document does not apply to the periodic assessment of the following electrical installations:
(a) Installations designed and constructed to AS/NZS 3000 provisions relating to specific design and installation. Refer to the verification specification prepared for the installation as required by AS/NZS 3000.
(b) Installations of the following types:
(i) Relocatable units and their site installations. Refer to the AS/NZS 3001 series.
(ii) Marinas and boat installations. Refer to the AS/NZS 3004 series.
(iii) Hazardous areas. Refer to AS/NZS 61241 series and AS/NZS 60079 series.
(iv) Electro-medical areas. Refer to AS/NZS 3003.
(v) Shows, carnivals and event installations. Refer to AS/NZS 3002.
(vi) Construction and demolition sites. Refer to AS/NZS 3012.
In New Zealand it does not apply toâ€”
(i) Electrical installations and equipment which operate at non-standard voltages and frequencies. Refer to NZS 6114;
(ii) Mobile electro-medical relocatable installations. Refer to NZS 6115; and
(iii) Areas of electrical installations where electrical animal stunning or meat conditioning occurs. Refer to NZS 6116.
NOTE Periodic testing of appliances is covered by AS/NZS 3760.
